movies.title: Inherit the Wind
movies.plot: Based on a real-life case in 1925, two great lawyers argue the case for and against a science teacher accused of the crime of teaching evolution.

events.title: John Scopes is found guilty of teaching evolution

movies.title: How the Grinch Stole Christmas!
movies.plot: Bitter and hateful, the Grinch is irritated at the thought of a nearby village having a happy time celebrating Christmas. Disguised as Santa Claus, with his dog made to look like a reindeer, he decides to raid the village to steal all the Christmas things.
